userManagement.AddUser_Vendor: Click here to select vendor code from the dropdown.
userManagement.AddUser_PointOfContact: Click here to select point of contact.
userManagement.AddUser_primaryContact: Click the checkbox to select primary contact.
userManagement.AddUser_UserName: Enter a unique username for the user.
userManagement.AddUser_Password: Set a secure password for the user.
userManagement.AddUser_Address1: Enter the primary or main address.
userManagement.AddUser_Address2: Enter the secondary or alternate address.
userManagement.AddUser_plant: Select the plant code from here.
userManagement.AddUser_Checkbox: Check the box to grant permission.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_Costing: Click here to add user-specific permissions for costing.
userManagement.AddUser_ApprovalType: Select the approval type for the user.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_Simulation: Click here to add user-specific permissions for simulation.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_Master: Click here to add user-specific permissions for master approval.
userManagement.AddUser_Permissions_onBoarding: Click here to add user-specific permissions for onboarding.
userManagement.AddUser_Master: Select the master for user approval.
userManagement.addUser_OnBoarding: Click here to add Onboarding approval type.
userManagement.AddUser_Cancel: Cancel the form and go back to the user listing page.
userManagement.AddUser_AddApprovalType: Click on the 'Add' button to add a level of user for the
userManagement.AddUser_Save: Save the user and go back to the user listing page.

addCompany.AddCompany_PlantCode: Click here to select plant code from the dropdown.
addCompany.AddCompany_Cancel: Click here to cancel and go back to the listing page.

addRole.AddRole_Checkbox: Check the box to grant permission.
addRole.dashboard: Click on this dashboard to change or update permissions.
addRole.masters: Click on this masters to change or update permissions.
addRole.additionalMasters: Click on this additional Masters to change or update permissions.
addRole.costing: Click on this costing to change or update permissions.
addRole.simulation: Click on this simulation to change or update permissions.
addRole.reports: Click on this report to change or update permissions.
addRole.users: Click on this users to change or update permissions.
addRole.RFQ: Click on this RFQ to change or update permissions.
addRole.NFR: Click on this NFR to change or update permissions.
addRole.audit: Click on this audit to change or update permissions.
addRole.AddRole_Cancel: Click here to cancel and go back to the listing page.

approvalForm.AddApproval_CostingLevel: Click here to select costing level.
approvalForm.AddApproval_SimulationLevel: Click here to select simulation level.
approvalForm.AddApproval_MasterLevel: Click here to select master level.
approvalForm.AddApproval_OnBoardingLevel: Click here to select onboarding level.
approvalForm.AddApproval_ApprovalType_Required: Click here to select approval type.
approvalForm.AddApproval_HighestApprovalLevel: Click here to select highest approval level.
approvalForm.AddApproval_Cancel: Click here to cancel  and go back to the listing page.

addRoleComponent.select_all: Click the checkbox to select all permissions for all modules.
addRoleComponent.specific_select: Click the checkbox to select permissions for a specific role.
addRoleComponent.action: Toggle this switch to allow or disallow action permissions.
